spec.name: Sindibad Karting
spec.description: Sindibad Karting is a dedicated go-kart racing track and facility located within the larger **Sindibad Park** leisure complex. It offers recreational and potentially competitive karting experiences for families and enthusiasts, contributing to the diverse array of entertainment options within the park.
